info.name: Nordlys.no - Dark and ad-free v1.1
info.description:
My first skin ever. Expect issues. I will be updating this, but not sure if I can update or if I have to resubmit. If the latter, check back for v2.

E-mail me on hyseptik@gmail.com for questions.
info.additionalInfo:
Feel free to modify and resubmit as you wish.

Update (08.11.16): Article contents now display properly. Removed various ads. More theming.
